products.name: UltraSmooth Gel Pens - Premium 12-Pack
products.description: Professional-grade gel pens with ultra-smooth ink flow. Perfect for signing important documents or detailed writing. Superior to standard office pens with 2x longer lasting ink.

products.name: EcoMax Recycled Copy Paper - 500 Sheets
products.description: 100% recycled premium copy paper. Brighter white than standard paper with 99.99% jam-free guarantee. Perfect for high-volume printing and professional presentations.

products.name: ErgoComfort Wireless Mouse - Precision Pro
products.description: Ergonomically designed wireless mouse with precision tracking and 18-month battery life. Reduces wrist strain by 40% compared to standard mice. Premium build quality.

products.name: StrongHold Premium Binders - 3-Ring Set
products.description: Heavy-duty 3-ring binders with reinforced spine and premium metal rings. Holds 50% more documents than standard binders. Lifetime durability guarantee.

products.name: PowerClean Disinfecting Wipes - 6-Pack
products.description: Hospital-grade disinfecting wipes that kill 99.9% of viruses and bacteria. Safe for electronics and surfaces. 3x more effective than standard cleaning wipes.

products.name: SmartCalculator Scientific Pro
products.description: Advanced scientific calculator with graphing capabilities and solar power. Features 500+ built-in functions and connects to mobile apps for enhanced learning.

products.name: FlexiDesk Adjustable Monitor Stand
products.description: Premium adjustable monitor stand with cable management and storage drawer. Improves posture and reduces neck strain. Supports monitors up to 32 inches.

products.name: QuickDry Whiteboard Markers - Vibrant 8-Pack
products.description: Low-odor whiteboard markers with quick-dry ink and precision tips. Vibrant colors that don't fade. Erases cleanly without ghosting or staining.

products.name: SecureShred Micro-Cut Shredder
products.description: Professional micro-cut shredder for maximum security. Shreds credit cards, CDs, and paper into confetti-sized pieces. Quiet operation with auto-reverse jam protection.

products.name: ComfortMax Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: Premium ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, breathable mesh, and adjustable armrests. Reduces back pain and improves productivity. 10-year warranty.

products.name: ProSort Desktop Organizer Deluxe
products.description: Multi-compartment desktop organizer with adjustable dividers and pen holders. Premium bamboo construction. Keeps desk 90% more organized than standard organizers.

products.name: TurboFast Label Maker Pro
products.description: Professional label maker with wireless connectivity and mobile app integration. Creates durable, waterproof labels in 50+ fonts and sizes. Perfect for office organization.
